title: Harden's Contract, Westbrook's Future
description:
Brian Windhorst is joined by ESPN's Tim MacMahon and Tim Bontemps to discuss how Harden’s new contract impacts the future of the 76ers and what the present state of the Lakers means for Westbrook including his interesting change of agents.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: Hoop Collective: Harden Signs A New Contract, What Do The Lakers Want With Westbrook?
